entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add hooks to disconnect/connect a PlatformView from a Handler in order to avoid memory leaks #16332
    .NET 8 GA
  • Provide API to retrieve the closest MAUI Element to a PlatformView #16330
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Mysterious back button shows up on root page when navigating back from second page #16328
    .NET 8 GA
  • Error when using Int32 as a resource for the parameter for <RoundRectangle CornerRadius=""> #16327
  • TabbedPage inside Grid works in debug mode, but throws exception in release mode #16326
  • Prompts are missing when creating a new page #16325
    .NET 8 GA
  • [WinUI] An exception is thrown after removing an item from its close button #16324
  • [WinUI] CarouselView layout issues #16322
    .NET 8 GA
  • DisplayAlert Displaying Beneath PopupPage (Mopups) on iOS #16321
  • [WinUI] CollectionView throws an exception after adding a second item #16320
    .NET 8 GA
  • window.open() returns null for MAUI.Blazor #16317
  • .NET Maui 7 app crashes on iOS 17 #16316

Closed

  • Switch control differences #6177
    Backlog
  • .PNG Tab Icons on iOS aren't scaled properly #8609
    .NET 8 GA
  • Windows emptyView text has different default placement #15131
    .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] MAUI ScrollView is not scrollable when Keyboard hides content #15159
  • Border StrokeThickness="0" not working when parent is Grid #15162
  • Cannot download a Visual Studio App Extension #16188
  • CommandMapper.Add() causes stack overflow #16263
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Adds prompts when creating a new page. #16331
    community ✨
  • [macios] test macios bump of illink and sdk #16329

Merged

  • [net8.0] Merge main into net8.0 #16144
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, 8.0-preview7
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16300
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix infinite recursion error in CommandMapper.Add() #16264
    community ✨

Updated

  • Document Element #16299
    area/docs 📓
  • Add hooks to disconnect/connect handler where developers can easily wire up handlers #16292
  • Add ViewHandler Mapper docs #16296
    area/docs 📓
  • Add visual testing support, on top of Appium #14999
    area/testing
  • [vs-workload][net8.0] Set EnableSideBySideManifests=true #16131
    area/setup 🪄, 8.0-preview7
  • [builds] Add another option to install the cert #16258
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Revert "Style specificity (#13818)" #16283
  • Bump GtkSharp from 3.24.24.34 to 3.24.24.95 #15818
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures
  • [iOS] Fix ScrollTo method issues #15984
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, layout-scrollview
  • [Android] Fix issue setting CarouselView position on Ctor or Appearing #16165
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • [iOS] Avoid crash setting custom icon in SearchHandler #14634
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • Added Device ID to Essentials.DeviceInfo #16290
    community ✨
  • [ios] fix memory leak in TimePicker #16265
    memory-leak 💦
  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, community ✨
  • [iOS] Add updates for LineHeight, TextDecorations, CharacterSpacing #16223
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label
